column4: hi, having an issue with 11.04 live. On most computers it runs just fine, but now I have one where I see a gdm logon prompt (it should automatically log on) with an automatic login thingy, but clicking that immediately returns me to the logon prompt again
any way to bypass it? Just need to secure some files on the computer before reinstalling it
I don't know, looks like gdm, dunno plymouth tho'
try deleting your stuff in the home directory
